name: Sacred Fire Demo
description:
The full version of Sacred Fire: A Role Playing Game is available on GOG.COM. You can purchase it here. What the heck is a psychological role playing game? How historically accurate is it? And more importantly how does it actually play? Find out by playing this free 20 minute demo.

The demo features character creation and the first chapter of the story, introducing innovative game-mechanics and key characters.

There are nuanced differences, in choices, character reactions and relationships when playing a male and a female protagonist.

This title is still 'In Development', so please leave feedback and help us shape this game into something truly unique.
